title: "IBM – Big Blue Goes Tiny With World’s First 2nm Chip Tech"
excerpt: "IBM has proven itself a standout time and time again, with the distinction of debuting the first 5nm, 7nm and 10nm test chips on the market. IBM’s first 7nm chip, Power10, was unveiled last year. Each incremental reduction in size translates to significant improvements in performance and efficiency—key to unlocking the full potential of ascendent technologies like hybrid cloud,"
